overview: Julio, a young and sexy Puerto Rican tattoo artist, works out of the basement of his cousin Jose's barbershop. Julio gets into trouble on an all too-frequent basis, Jose, is barely keeping things under control around the shop. Between Tony, the mafioso wannabe barber who would like to take over the shop, and Gustav, the gossip-obsessed, gay barber in a desperate search for a mate, it's a wonder any hair actually gets cut.
title: Julio
